block.p: Lisa Marie Dallenbach, a daughter of Mary Dallenbach-Kaffke of Bernardsville, N.J., and the late Robert H. Dallenbach, was married yesterday to Donald John Burkitt, the son of Lena Castro of Neptune Beach, Fla., and John Burkitt of Merrick, N.Y. The Rev. Richard Rolfs performed the ceremony at St. Francis Solano Roman Catholic Church in Sonoma, Calif.
The couple received M.B.A. degrees from Fordham University, where they met.

Lisa Marie Dallenbach, a daughter of Mary Dallenbach-Kaffke of Bernardsville, N.J., and the late Robert H. Dallenbach, was married yesterday to Donald John Burkitt, the son of Lena Castro of Neptune Beach, Fla., and John Burkitt of Merrick, N.Y. The Rev. Richard Rolfs performed the ceremony at St. Francis Solano Roman Catholic Church in Sonoma, Calif.
The couple received M.B.A. degrees from Fordham University, where they met.

The bride, 32, is a marketing director in Manhattan for Digitas, an Internet and e-business consulting company. She graduated from Boston College. Her father owned Trebor Financial, a computer leasing and distribution business that was in Torrance, Calif.

The bridegroom, 34, is a manager in the corporate restructuring practice in Manhattan at Arthur Andersen, the consulting firm. He graduated from the State University at Binghamton, N.Y. His mother is a registered nurse in the perinatal unit at Memorial Hospital in Jacksonville, Fla. His father retired as a firefighter with Engine Company 268 in Rockaway Beach, Queens.
